nodes.label: Implementation of a Fast Fourier Transform Algorithm onto a Manycore Embedded System
nodes.title: Implementation of a Fast Fourier Transform Algorithm onto a Manycore Embedded System
nodes.abstract: The Fourier transform is the main processing step applied to data collected from the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) receivers. Optimized FFT implementation for execution on the Kalray MPPA manycore processor.

nodes.label: A simple fast fourier transformation algorithm to microcontrollers and mini computers
nodes.title: A simple fast fourier transformation algorithm to microcontrollers and mini computers
nodes.abstract: Presents an algorithm to the FFT which contains a reduced number of logical and elementary operations, optimized for microcontrollers and FPGAs.

nodes.label: Spectral Analysis by STM32 Microcontroller of the Mixed Signal
nodes.title: Spectral Analysis by STM32 Microcontroller of the Mixed Signal
nodes.abstract: Realization of Fast Fourier transform Radix-2 for STM32F746ZG microcontroller and measurement of its precision compared with professional spectrum analyzer.

nodes.label: Accelerating Convolutional Neural Network With FFT on Embedded Hardware
nodes.title: Accelerating Convolutional Neural Network With FFT on Embedded Hardware
nodes.abstract: Evaluates FFT-based convolution for CNNs in terms of computation complexity and memory storage requirements for embedded hardware.

nodes.label: Fast Fourier Transform Adjusted into 8 Bit Format for Instrumentation Purposes
nodes.title: Fast Fourier Transform Adjusted into 8 Bit Format for Instrumentation Purposes
nodes.abstract: Iterative Fast Fourier Transform Radix-2 Decimation-In-Frequency algorithm adjusted into an 8 bit format for increasing processing speed in microcontrollers.

nodes.label: FFT-based deep learning deployment in embedded systems
nodes.title: FFT-based deep learning deployment in embedded systems
nodes.abstract: Deep learning deployment in embedded systems using FFT-based convolution to reduce computational load.

nodes.label: Design and Implementation of an Ultralow-Energy FFT ASIC for Processing ECG in Cardiac Pacemakers
nodes.title: Design and Implementation of an Ultralow-Energy FFT ASIC for Processing ECG in Cardiac Pacemakers
nodes.abstract: Data-driven design approach for an FFT ASIC solution for deeply embedded biomedical applications like cardiac pacemakers.

nodes.label: Embedded DRAM-Based Memory Customization for Low-Cost FFT Processor Design
nodes.title: Embedded DRAM-Based Memory Customization for Low-Cost FFT Processor Design
nodes.abstract: eDRAM-based memory customization techniques for low-cost fast Fourier transform processor design exploiting regular memory access patterns.

nodes.label: High performance and resource efficient FFT processor based on CORDIC algorithm
nodes.title: High performance and resource efficient FFT processor based on CORDIC algorithm
nodes.abstract: Improved multipath delay commutator pipelining architecture based on radix-2 time decimation algorithm using CORDIC for complex number multiplication.

nodes.label: A radix-2 FFT algorithm for modern SIMD architectures
nodes.title: A radix-2 FFT algorithm for modern SIMD architectures
nodes.abstract: Modern Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) microprocessor architectures allow parallel floating point operations for FFT computation.

nodes.label: Efficient FPGA implementation of FFT/IFFT processor
nodes.title: Efficient FPGA implementation of FFT/IFFT processor
nodes.abstract: FPGA implementation of FFT/IFFT processor for real-time signal processing with focus on hardware complexity and execution speed.

nodes.label: An Efficient FPGA Implementation of 1024-Point FFT/IFFT Processor
nodes.title: An Efficient FPGA Implementation of 1024-Point FFT/IFFT Processor
nodes.abstract: Efficient architecture of FFT/IFFT processor based on radix-2 Decimation in Frequency algorithm for N=1024 with optimized twiddle factor storage.

nodes.label: Cooley-Tukey FFT algorithm
nodes.title: An Algorithm for the Machine Calculation of Complex Fourier Series
nodes.abstract: The seminal paper introducing the Fast Fourier Transform algorithm that revolutionized digital signal processing.

nodes.label: DSP processor architectures
nodes.title: Digital Signal Processor Architectures and Implementation
nodes.abstract: Foundational work on digital signal processor architectures and their implementation for various DSP algorithms.

nodes.label: Embedded Systems Design
nodes.title: Embedded Systems Design: An Introduction to Processes, Tools and Techniques
nodes.abstract: Comprehensive introduction to embedded systems design processes, tools and techniques including signal processing applications.
